title: Champion Mastery System Question!!?!

embed.description: league of legends champion mastery ribbons - Google Search

body: Does anyone know how to get the champion ribbon different colours like blue and purple and stuff? i put a link where you can see what im talking about if your not sure if anyone knows please let me know! thank you

replies.body:
Those are screenshots from when champion mastery was still only on the PBE. It could have changed since then. PBE is the server for beta testing new things in League, by the way.

I wouldn't know myself because I haven't levelled up a champion to level five yet :'(.
